00047 template <class TImage>
00048 class LeastSquaresVnlCostFunction : public vnl_cost_function
00049 {
00050   private:
00051 
00052   typedef TImage   ImageType;
00053   typedef typename ImageType::Pointer ImagePointer;
00054   typedef typename ImageType::ConstPointer ImageConstPointer;
00055 
00056   typedef typename ImageType::RegionType  RegionType;
00057   typedef typename ImageType::SizeType    SizeType;
00058   typedef typename ImageType::IndexType   IndexType;
00059   typedef typename ImageType::SpacingType SpacingType;
00060   typedef typename ImageType::PointType   PointType;
00061 
00062   typedef ImageMaskSpatialObject< TImage::ImageDimension > MaskType;
00063   typedef typename MaskType::Pointer   MaskPointer;
00064 
00065   typedef Euler3DTransform<double> TransformType;
00066   typedef typename TransformType::Pointer TransformPointerType;
00067 
00068   typedef LinearInterpolateImageFunctionWithWeights<ImageType, double> InterpolatorType;
00069   typedef typename InterpolatorType::Pointer InterpolatorPointer;
00070 
00071   typedef ContinuousIndex<double, TImage::ImageDimension> ContinuousIndexType;
00072 
00074   typedef OrientedSpatialFunction<double, 3, PointType> FunctionType;
00075 
00077   typedef ImageRegionConstIteratorWithIndex< ImageType >  ConstIteratorType;

00079   vnl_sparse_matrix<float> H;
00080   vnl_vector<float> HtY;
00081   vnl_vector<float> Y;
00082 
00083   float lambda;
00084 
00085   struct img_size {
00086      unsigned int width;
00087      unsigned int height;
00088      unsigned int depth;
00089   } x_size;
00090 
00091   std::vector<ImagePointer>  m_Images;
00092   std::vector<RegionType>    m_Regions;
00093   std::vector<MaskPointer>   m_Masks;
00094   ImageConstPointer                                      m_ReferenceImage;
00095   std::vector< std::vector<TransformPointerType> > m_Transforms;
00096   RegionType m_OutputImageRegion;

00098   void set(float * array, int size, float value) {
00099     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00100       array[i] = value;
00101   }
00102 
00103   // Mirror of the position pos. abs(pos) must not be > 2*(size-1)
00104   int mirror(int pos, int size) {
00105     int output = abs(pos);
00106 
00107     while (output >= size)
00108       output = abs(output - (output - size + 1) * 2);
00109 
00110     return output;
00111   }
00112 
00113   void get_row(const vnl_vector<float>& image, img_size & size, int row, int frame, float * output) {
00114     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size.width; i++)
00115       output[i] = image[i + row * size.width + frame * size.width * size.height];
00116   }
00117 
00118   void set_row(vnl_vector<float>& image, img_size & size, int row, int frame, float * input) {
00119     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size.width; i++)
00120       image[i + row * size.width + frame * size.width * size.height] = input[i];
00121   }
00122 
00123   void get_col(const vnl_vector<float>& image, img_size & size, int col, int frame, float * output) {
00124     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size.height; i++)
00125       output[i] = image[col + i * size.width + frame * size.width * size.height];
00126   }
00127 
00128   void set_col(vnl_vector<float>& image, img_size & size, int col, int frame, float * input) {
00129     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size.height; i++)
00130       image[col + i * size.width + frame * size.width * size.height] = input[i];
00131   }
00132 
00133   void get_spec(const vnl_vector<float>& image, img_size & size, int row, int col, float * output) {
00134     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size.depth; i++)
00135       output[i] = image[col + row * size.width + i * size.width * size.height];
00136   }
00137 
00138   void set_spec(vnl_vector<float>& image, img_size & size, int row, int col, float * input) {
00139     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size.depth; i++)
00140       image[col + row * size.width + i * size.width * size.height] = input[i];
00141   }
00142 
00143 
00144   void convol1d(float * kernel, int ksize, float * src, int src_size, float * dest)
00145   {
00146     int n2 = ksize / 2;
00147     int k;
00148 
00149     set(dest, src_size, 0);
00150     for (int i = 0; i < src_size; i++)
00151     {
00152       for (int j = 0; j < ksize; j++)
00153       {
00154         k = i - j + n2;
00155         k = mirror(k, src_size); // dcb|abcd    wxyz|yxw
00156         dest[i] += kernel[j] * src[k];
00157       }
00158     }
00159   }
00160 
00161   // 3D convolution : over the rows
00162   void convol3dx(const vnl_vector<float>& image, vnl_vector<float>& image_conv, img_size& size, float * kernel, int ksize) {
00163     float * drow = new float[size.width];
00164     float * srow = new float[size.width];
00165 
00166     for (unsigned int l = 0; l < size.depth; l++) {
00167       for (unsigned int py = 0; py < size.height; py++) {
00168         get_row(image, size, py, l, srow);
00169         convol1d(kernel, ksize, srow, size.width, drow);
00170         set_row(image_conv, size, py, l, drow);
00171       }
00172     }
00173 
00174     delete[] drow;
00175     delete[] srow;
00176   }
00177 
00178   // 3D convolution : over the columns
00179   void convol3dy(const vnl_vector<float>& image, vnl_vector<float>& image_conv, img_size & size, float * kernel, int ksize) {
00180     float * dcol = new float[size.height];
00181     float * scol = new float[size.height];
00182 
00183     for (unsigned int l = 0; l < size.depth; l++) {
00184       for (unsigned int px = 0; px < size.width; px++) {
00185         get_col(image, size, px, l, scol);
00186         convol1d(kernel, ksize, scol, size.height, dcol);
00187         set_col(image_conv, size, px, l, dcol);
00188       }
00189     }
00190 
00191     delete[] dcol;
00192     delete[] scol;
00193   }
00194 
00195   // 3D convolution : over the spectra
00196   void convol3dz(const vnl_vector<float>& image, vnl_vector<float>& image_conv, img_size & size, float * kernel, int ksize) {
00197     float * dspec = new float[size.depth];
00198     float * sspec = new float[size.depth];
00199 
00200     for (unsigned int py = 0; py < size.height; py++) {
00201       for (unsigned int px = 0; px < size.width; px++) {
00202         get_spec(image, size, py, px, sspec);
00203         convol1d(kernel, ksize, sspec, size.depth, dspec);
00204         set_spec(image_conv, size, py, px, dspec);
00205       }
00206     }
00207 
00208     delete[] dspec;
00209     delete[] sspec;
00210   }
00211 
00212   public: LeastSquaresVnlCostFunction(unsigned int dim): vnl_cost_function(dim) { lambda = 0.1; }
00213 
00214   // 3D convolution : over the spectra
00215   void get_derivative_x(const vnl_vector<double>& x, vnl_vector<float>& deriv_x) {
00216 
00217     vnl_vector<float>  x_float;
00218     x_float = vnl_matops::d2f(x);
00219 
00220     float* kernel = new float[2];
00221     kernel[0] = -1; kernel[1] = 1;
00222 
00223     float * drow = new float[x_size.width];
00224     float * srow = new float[x_size.width];
00225 
00226     for (unsigned int l = 0; l < x_size.depth; l++) {
00227       for (unsigned int py = 0; py < x_size.height; py++) {
00228         get_row(x_float, x_size, py, l, srow);
00229         convol1d(kernel, 2, srow, x_size.width, drow);
00230         set_row(deriv_x, x_size, py, l, drow);
00231       }
00232     }
00233 
00234     delete[] drow;
00235     delete[] srow;
00236   }
00237 
00238   // 3D convolution : over the spectra
00239   void get_derivative_y(const vnl_vector<double>& x, vnl_vector<float>& deriv_y) {
00240 
00241     vnl_vector<float>  x_float;
00242     x_float = vnl_matops::d2f(x);
00243 
00244     float* kernel = new float[2];
00245     kernel[0] = -1; kernel[1] = 1;
00246 
00247     float * dcol = new float[x_size.height];
00248     float * scol = new float[x_size.height];
00249 
00250     for (unsigned int l = 0; l < x_size.depth; l++) {
00251       for (unsigned int px = 0; px < x_size.width; px++) {
00252         get_col(x_float, x_size, px, l, scol);
00253         convol1d(kernel, 2, scol, x_size.height, dcol);
00254         set_col(deriv_y, x_size, px, l, dcol);
00255       }
00256     }
00257 
00258     delete[] dcol;
00259     delete[] scol;
00260   }
00261 
00262   // 3D convolution : over the spectra
00263   void get_derivative_z(const vnl_vector<double>& x, vnl_vector<float>& deriv_z) {
00264 
00265     vnl_vector<float>  x_float;
00266     x_float = vnl_matops::d2f(x);
00267 
00268     float* kernel = new float[2];
00269     kernel[0] = -1; kernel[1] = 1;
00270 
00271     float * dspec = new float[x_size.depth];
00272     float * sspec = new float[x_size.depth];
00273 
00274     for (unsigned int py = 0; py < x_size.height; py++) {
00275       for (unsigned int px = 0; px < x_size.width; px++) {
00276         get_spec(x_float, x_size, py, px, sspec);
00277         convol1d(kernel, 2, sspec, x_size.depth, dspec);
00278         set_spec(deriv_z, x_size, py, px, dspec);
00279       }
00280     }
00281 
00282     delete[] dspec;
00283     delete[] sspec;
00284   }
00285 
00286   typedef vnl_vector<float> VnlVectorType;
00287   typedef vnl_sparse_matrix<float> VnlSparseMatrixType;
00288 
00289   double f(const vnl_vector<double>& x)
00290   {
00291     // Calculate the error with respect to the low resolution images
00292 
00293     vnl_vector<float>  x_float;
00294     x_float = vnl_matops::d2f(x);
00295 
00296     vnl_vector<float> Hx;
00297     H.mult(x_float,Hx);
00298 
00299     vnl_vector<float> HxMinusY;
00300     HxMinusY = Hx - Y;
00301 
00302     Hx.clear();
00303 
00304     double mse = HxMinusY.squared_magnitude() / HxMinusY.size();
00305 
00306     HxMinusY.clear();
00307 
00308     // Calculate the square of 1st derivatives along x, y, and z
00309     double reg = 0.0;
00310 
00311     float* kernel = new float[2];
00312     kernel[0] = -1; kernel[1] = 1;
00313 
00314     vnl_vector<float> DxX;
00315     DxX.set_size( x_float.size() );
00316     convol3dx(x_float, DxX, x_size, kernel, 2);
00317     for(unsigned int i=0; i<x_float.size(); i++)
00318       reg += DxX[i]*DxX[i] / x_float.size();
00319     DxX.clear();
00320 
00321     vnl_vector<float> DyX;
00322     DyX.set_size( x_float.size() );
00323     convol3dy(x_float, DyX, x_size, kernel, 2);
00324     for(unsigned int i=0; i<x_float.size(); i++)
00325       reg += DyX[i]*DyX[i] / x_float.size();
00326     DyX.clear();
00327 
00328     vnl_vector<float> DzX;
00329     DzX.set_size( x_float.size() );
00330     convol3dz(x_float, DzX, x_size, kernel, 2);
00331     for(unsigned int i=0; i<x_float.size(); i++)
00332       reg += DzX[i]*DzX[i] / x_float.size();
00333     DzX.clear();
00334 
00335     delete[] kernel;
00336 
00337     // Calculate the cost function by combining both terms
00338 
00339     double value = mse + lambda*reg;
00340 
00341     std::cout << "error, mse, reg = " << value << " , " << mse << " , " << lambda*reg << std::endl;
00342 
00343     return value;
00344 
00345   }
00346 
00347   void gradf(const vnl_vector<double>& x, vnl_vector<double>& g)
00348   {
00349     vnl_vector<float>  x_float;
00350 
00351     x_float = vnl_matops::d2f(x);
00352 
00353     vnl_vector<float> Hx;
00354     H.mult(x_float,Hx);
00355 
00356     // Calculate Ht*Hx. Note that this is calculated as Hx*H since
00357     // Ht*Hx = (Hxt*H)t and for Vnl (Hxt*H)t = Hxt*H = Hx*H because
00358     // the vnl_vector doesn't have a 2nd dimension. This allows us
00359     // to save a lot of memory because we don't need to store Ht.
00360 
00361     vnl_vector<float> HtHx;
00362     H.pre_mult(Hx,HtHx);
00363     Hx.clear();
00364 
00365     double factor = 2.0 / Y.size();
00366     g = vnl_matops::f2d( (-HtY + HtHx)*factor );
00367 
00368     HtHx.clear();
00369 
00370     // regularization term
00371 
00372 /*    factor = 2*lambda/x_float.size();
00373 
00374     float* kernel = new float[3];
00375     kernel[0] = -1; kernel[1] = 2; kernel[2] = -1;
00376 
00377     vnl_vector<float> DxX;
00378     DxX.set_size( x_float.size() );
00379     convol3dx(x_float, DxX, x_size, kernel, 3);
00380     g = g + vnl_matops::f2d( DxX * factor );
00381     DxX.clear();
00382 
00383     vnl_vector<float> DyX;
00384     DyX.set_size( x_float.size() );
00385     convol3dy(x_float, DyX, x_size, kernel, 3);
00386     g = g + vnl_matops::f2d( DyX * factor );
00387     DyX.clear();
00388 
00389     vnl_vector<float> DzX;
00390     DzX.set_size( x_float.size() );
00391     convol3dz(x_float, DzX, x_size, kernel, 3);
00392     g = g + vnl_matops::f2d( DzX * factor );
00393     DzX.clear();
00394 
00395     delete[] kernel; */
00396 
00397   }
00398 
00399   void Initialize()
00400   {
00401     IndexType start_hr;
00402     SizeType  size_hr;
00403 
00404     m_OutputImageRegion = m_ReferenceImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00405     start_hr = m_OutputImageRegion.GetIndex();
00406     size_hr = m_OutputImageRegion.GetSize();
00407 
00408     x_size.width  = size_hr[0];
00409     x_size.height = size_hr[1];
00410     x_size.depth  = size_hr[2];
00411 
00412     IndexType end_hr;
00413     end_hr[0] = start_hr[0] + size_hr[0] - 1 ;
00414     end_hr[1] = start_hr[1] + size_hr[1] - 1 ;
00415     end_hr[2] = start_hr[2] + size_hr[2] - 1 ;
00416 
00417     // Interpolator for HR image
00418 
00419     InterpolatorPointer interpolator = InterpolatorType::New();
00420     interpolator -> SetInputImage( m_ReferenceImage );
00421 
00422     // Differential continuous indexes to perform the neighborhood iteration
00423     SpacingType spacing_lr = m_Images[0] -> GetSpacing();
00424     SpacingType spacing_hr = m_ReferenceImage -> GetSpacing();
00425 
00426     std::vector<ContinuousIndexType> deltaIndexes;
00427     int npoints =  spacing_lr[2] / (2.0 * spacing_hr[2]) ;
00428     ContinuousIndexType delta;
00429     delta[0] = 0.0; delta[1] = 0.0;
00430 
00431     for (int i = -npoints ; i <= npoints; i++ )
00432     {
00433       delta[2] = i * 0.5 / (double) npoints;
00434       deltaIndexes.push_back(delta);
00435     }
00436 
00437     // Set size of matrices
00438     unsigned int ncols = m_OutputImageRegion.GetNumberOfPixels();
00439 
00440     unsigned int nrows = 0;
00441     for(unsigned int im = 0; im < m_Images.size(); im++)
00442       nrows += m_Regions[im].GetNumberOfPixels();
00443 
00444     H.set_size(nrows, ncols);
00445     Y.set_size(nrows);
00446     Y.fill(0.0);
00447 
00448     unsigned int offset = 0;
00449 
00450     // TODO This can be parallelized by using openmp
00451 
00452     for(unsigned int im = 0; im < m_Images.size(); im++)
00453     {
00454       SpacingType inputSpacing = m_Images[im] -> GetSpacing();
00455 
00456       // PSF definition
00457       //TODO Give the possibility to choose the PDF
00458       typename FunctionType::Pointer function = FunctionType::New();
00459       function -> SetPSF( 1 );
00460       function -> SetDirection( m_Images[im] -> GetDirection() );
00461       function -> SetSpacing( m_Images[im] -> GetSpacing() );
00462 
00463       // Iteration over slices
00464 
00465       IndexType inputIndex = m_Regions[im].GetIndex();
00466       SizeType  inputSize  = m_Regions[im].GetSize();
00467 
00468       IndexType lrIndex;
00469       IndexType lrDiffIndex;
00470       unsigned int lrLinearIndex;
00471 
00472       IndexType hrIndex;
00473       IndexType hrDiffIndex;
00474       ContinuousIndexType hrContIndex;
00475       unsigned int hrLinearIndex;
00476 
00477       ContinuousIndexType nbIndex;
00478 
00479       PointType lrPoint;
00480       PointType nbPoint;
00481       PointType transformedPoint;
00482 
00483       for ( unsigned int i=inputIndex[2]; i < inputIndex[2] + inputSize[2]; i++ )
00484       {
00485 
00486         RegionType wholeSliceRegion;
00487         wholeSliceRegion = m_Regions[im];
00488 
00489         IndexType  wholeSliceRegionIndex = wholeSliceRegion.GetIndex();
00490         SizeType   wholeSliceRegionSize  = wholeSliceRegion.GetSize();
00491 
00492         wholeSliceRegionIndex[2]= i;
00493         wholeSliceRegionSize[2] = 1;
00494 
00495         wholeSliceRegion.SetIndex(wholeSliceRegionIndex);
00496         wholeSliceRegion.SetSize(wholeSliceRegionSize);
00497 
00498         ConstIteratorType fixedIt( m_Images[im], wholeSliceRegion);
00499 
00500         double lrValue;
00501         double hrValue;
00502 
00503         for(fixedIt.GoToBegin(); !fixedIt.IsAtEnd(); ++fixedIt)
00504         {
00505           lrIndex = fixedIt.GetIndex();
00506           m_Images[im] -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint( lrIndex, lrPoint );
00507 
00508           if ( m_Masks.size() > 0)
00509             if ( ! m_Masks[im] -> IsInside(lrPoint) )
00510               continue;
00511 
00512           transformedPoint = m_Transforms[im][i] -> TransformPoint( lrPoint );
00513 
00514           if ( ! interpolator -> IsInsideBuffer( transformedPoint ) )
00515             continue;
00516 
00517 
00518           lrDiffIndex[0] = lrIndex[0] - inputIndex[0];
00519           lrDiffIndex[1] = lrIndex[1] - inputIndex[1];
00520           lrDiffIndex[2] = lrIndex[2] - inputIndex[2];
00521 
00522           lrLinearIndex = lrDiffIndex[0] + lrDiffIndex[1]*inputSize[0] + lrDiffIndex[2]*inputSize[0]*inputSize[1];
00523 
00524           Y[lrLinearIndex + offset] = fixedIt.Get();
00525 
00526           function -> SetCenter( lrPoint );
00527 
00528           for(unsigned int k=0; k<deltaIndexes.size(); k++)
00529           {
00530             nbIndex[0] = deltaIndexes[k][0] + lrIndex[0];
00531             nbIndex[1] = deltaIndexes[k][1] + lrIndex[1];
00532             nbIndex[2] = deltaIndexes[k][2] + lrIndex[2];
00533 
00534             m_Images[im] -> TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint( nbIndex, nbPoint );
00535             lrValue = function -> Evaluate(nbPoint);
00536 
00537             if ( lrValue > 0)
00538             {
00539               transformedPoint = m_Transforms[im][i] -> TransformPoint( nbPoint);
00540 
00541               m_ReferenceImage -> TransformPhysicalPointToContinuousIndex( transformedPoint, hrContIndex );
00542 
00543               bool isInsideHR = true;
00544 
00545               // FIXME This checking should be done for all points first, and discard the point
00546               // if al least one point is out of the reference image
00547 
00548               if ( (hrContIndex[0] < start_hr[0]) || (hrContIndex[0] > end_hr[0]) ||
00549                    (hrContIndex[1] < start_hr[1]) || (hrContIndex[1] > end_hr[1]) ||
00550                    (hrContIndex[2] < start_hr[2]) || (hrContIndex[2] > end_hr[2]) )
00551                  isInsideHR = false;
00552 
00553               if ( isInsideHR )
00554               {
00555                 hrValue = interpolator -> Evaluate( transformedPoint );
00556 
00557                 for(unsigned int n=0; n<interpolator -> GetContributingNeighbors(); n++)
00558                 {
00559                   hrIndex = interpolator -> GetIndex(n);
00560 
00561                   hrDiffIndex[0] = hrIndex[0] - start_hr[0];
00562                   hrDiffIndex[1] = hrIndex[1] - start_hr[1];
00563                   hrDiffIndex[2] = hrIndex[2] - start_hr[2];
00564 
00565                   hrLinearIndex = hrDiffIndex[0] + hrDiffIndex[1]*size_hr[0] + hrDiffIndex[2]*size_hr[0]*size_hr[1];
00566                   H(lrLinearIndex + offset, hrLinearIndex) += interpolator -> GetOverlap(n)* lrValue;
00567                 }
00568 
00569               }
00570 
00571             }
00572 
00573           }
00574 
00575         }
00576 
00577       }
00578 
00579       offset += m_Regions[im].GetNumberOfPixels();
00580 
00581     }
00582 
00583     // Normalize H
00584     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < H.rows(); i++)
00585     {
00586       double sum = H.sum_row(i);
00587 
00588       VnlSparseMatrixType::row & r = H.get_row(i);
00589       VnlSparseMatrixType::row::iterator col_iter = r.begin();
00590 
00591       for ( ;col_iter != r.end(); ++col_iter)
00592         (*col_iter).second = (*col_iter).second / sum;
00593 
00594     }
00595 
00596     // Precalcule Ht*Y. Note that this is calculated as Y*H since
00597     // Ht*Y = (Yt*H)t and for Vnl (Yt*H)t = (Yt*H) = Y*H because
00598     // the vnl_vector doesn't have a 2nd dimension. This allows us
00599     // to save a lot of memory because we don't need to store Ht.
00600     H.pre_mult(Y,HtY);
00601 
00602   }
00603 
00604   void SetLambda(float value)
00605   {
00606     lambda = value;
00607   }
00608 
00609   void AddImage( ImageType* image )
00610   {
00611     m_Images.push_back( image );
00612 
00613     // Add transforms for this image
00614     m_Transforms.resize( m_Transforms.size() + 1 );
00615     SizeType imageSize = image -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00616     m_Transforms[m_Transforms.size()-1].resize( imageSize[2]);
00617 
00618     // Initialize transforms
00619     for (unsigned int i=0; i<imageSize[2]; i++)
00620       m_Transforms[m_Transforms.size()-1][i] = TransformType::New();
00621 
00622   }
00623 
00624   void AddRegion( RegionType region)
00625   {
00626     m_Regions.push_back( region );
00627   }
00628 
00629   void AddMask( MaskType *mask)
00630   {
00631     m_Masks.push_back( mask );
00632   }
00633 
00634   void SetReferenceImage( const ImageType * image )
00635   {
00636     m_ReferenceImage = image;
00637   }
00638 
00639   void SetTransform( int i, int j, TransformType* transform )
00640   {
00641     m_Transforms[i][j] = transform;
00642   }
00643 
00644 
00645 };
00646 
00647 } // namespace btk

00649 #endif /* BTKLEASTSQUARESVNLCOSTFUNCTION_H_ */
